Pierre had already long been feeling in him- 
self that refreshing source of blessedness which now flooded his heart with glad emotion. 
SOON AFTER THIS there came into the dark cham- ber to fetch Pierre, not the Rhetor but Pierre's sponsor, Willarski, whom he recognized by his voice. To fresh questions as to the firmness of his resolution Pierre replied: "Yes, yes, I agree," and with a beaming, childlike smile, his
